video.title: Vampire Knight
video.synopsis: At Cross Academy, two student disciplinary committee members are tasked with keeping the peace between a human class and a night class of vampires.

episodes.synopsis: Cross Academy has two sessions, the Day Class and the Night Class; the latter consists of students who are beautiful, intelligent ... and vampires!
episodes.title: Night of Vampires

episodes.synopsis: Yuki is busy patrolling the school grounds for Day Class girls who are trying to sneak chocolates to the Night Class boys for St. Xocolatl’s Day.
episodes.title: Memories of Blood

episodes.synopsis: When Zero suddenly leaves the school grounds, Yuki goes after him and roams the streets alone, until a mysterious mother and child appear before her.
episodes.title: The Fang of Penitence

episodes.synopsis: Seeing the state Yuki is in, Kaname takes her from Zero, who is speechless when he realizes what he has done. Yuki cries, unaware of Zero’s secret.
episodes.title: Trigger of Condemnation

episodes.synopsis: A new ethics teacher arrives at Cross Academy. His atypical looks are all the buzz among the Day Class; even Zero has lost his usual composure.
episodes.title: Moonlight Festivities

episodes.synopsis: Zero is tempted to sink his fangs into Yuki, and even though he's able to regain his composure, he finds himself the target of a teacher.
episodes.title: Their Choices

episodes.synopsis: Yuki makes a decision regarding Zero, who is determined to fight his affliction until the very end. Yuki feels guilty for betraying Kaname.
episodes.title: The Scarlet Maze

episodes.synopsis: There's a commotion in the Moon dormitory when the Night Class gets word that Takuma’s grandfather, a figure in the vampire world, will be visiting.
episodes.title: Gunshot of Sorrow

episodes.synopsis: Day Class students are chasing after the Night Class due to the upcoming dance. Meanwhile, the Headmaster asks Yuki to show a transfer student around.
episodes.title: Crimson Gaze

episodes.synopsis: Zero tutors Yuki for an exam, but all the while something is wrong with him. Meanwhile, at the Moon dormitory, Kaname confronts Maria in his room.
episodes.title: The Princess of Darkness

episodes.synopsis: Maria’s masked servant reveals himself as a jealous figure from Zero's past whom Zero has not seen since their separation long ago.
episodes.title: Consequence of Desire

episodes.synopsis: Yuki learns Maria's true identity. With this new information, Yuki accepts a deal to offer her blood in order to save Zero.
episodes.title: Vow of the Pureblood

episodes.synopsis: Shizuka suffers a wound. Meanwhile, Yuki and Zero try to find out where Shizuka may have gone, but Zero's constantly thwarted by his Level E seizures.
episodes.title: Crimson Chains

episodes.synopsis: After Shizuka Hio’s death, peace is restored at the academy. But when Zero returns, the vampires of the Senate accuse him of murder.
episodes.title: Burden of Sinners

episodes.synopsis: Yuki has a lot on her mind after almost being kissed by Zero. She asserts that she will not speak to Kaname until he admits to Zero’s innocence.
episodes.title: The Eternal Promise

episodes.synopsis: The Night Class goes to the Aido family’s vacation home during the long break, but Hanabusa decides to stay at the academy to investigate Kaname.
episodes.title: The Azure Portrait

episodes.synopsis: While the Night Class is at the Aido family’s vacation home, Yuki, driven by her desire to stop hurting Zero, tries to regain her memory of the past.
episodes.title: Devil's Awakening

episodes.synopsis: Yuki is continually haunted by visions of blood. Nevertheless, she is determined to find out about her past from Kaname.
episodes.title: The Subordinate's Trap

episodes.synopsis: Kaname asks Yuki to be his lover. The Night Class guards begin accompanying her everywhere, and Yuki cannot hide her embarrassment.
episodes.title: The Fake Lovers

episodes.synopsis: Senri returns to the Academy, but upon having a confidential talk with Ichiru, he becomes noticeably different from before.
episodes.title: The Kiss of Thorns

episodes.synopsis: Yuki wakes up a vampire, and her memory of her childhood returns. She now remembers her father, her mother and her brother.
episodes.title: Spiraling Recollections

episodes.synopsis: Yuki now understands who she really is. Worried about Zero, she sneaks out of her room to find him -- but he simply can't accept what she has become.
episodes.title: Revival of the Mad Emperor

episodes.synopsis: The Headmaster calls for an emergency evacuation of the Day Class students, as Rido’s servant vampires begin attacking the students.
episodes.title: Prelude to the Battle

episodes.synopsis: In order to protect the academy, the Headmaster confronts the head of the Hunter Society while Rido is still on the rampage.
episodes.title: Two Souls

episodes.synopsis: Yuki decides that as Guardian, she must protect all the students at the academy and fight Rido.
episodes.title: World's End

episodes.synopsis: All of Zero’s strength is not enough to kill Rido -- he will need Kaname's help. But the fight will leave Cross Academy devastated.
episodes.title: Vampire Knight
